item.title: Its outside the Sainsbury‚Äôs Express shop on Beckenham Road, 21st November

item.title: Fly tipping, 21st November
item.description:
Someone dumps their mess on the kerbside in front of my house. Because their is a children's school near by people have problems getting past with prams and kids. It happens on the corner of Becks Road and Birkbeck Road in Sidcup. It happens when it is dark and around midnight, and always this time of year. I have had this problem before and reported it, and the council were great and dealt with it within a couple of days.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Becks Road, Albany Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves and mud near the entrance of The Gorse, Manor Park causing hazards, 21st November
item.description:
There are many leaves and mud that are piling up at the entrance the woods and entrance to The Gorse, Manor Park which is making it difficult to walk or even to park(cars are slipping) Please could this area be cleaned so it is less hazardous for us. Thank you very much PS If you are able to inform us of an estimated day this will happen we can make sure there are no cars blocking the way. Thank you!!üôè
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Park, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead tree, 21st November
item.description:
Re previous report 8441010. The dead tree has been removed but no new tree has been planted. Yet the system has marked this problem as Fixed. It is not fixed! Please confirm that you intend to replace the tree and do not flag this report as Fixed until you have.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 59, Birkenhead Street, King's Cross, Camden Town, London Borough of Camden
Report on FixMyStreet
